body:
Fixes two errors:
- patch does not apply to newer gcc 8 versions
- bootstrap does not work with this version of apple-clang.

The concretizer acts a little weird when asking for `gcc@8` now, preferring to switch away from the default apple-clang compiler over changing the `+bootstrap` variant, but it works when installing `gcc@8 %apple-clang`.
title: Fix GCC 8 build on macOS bigsur %apple-clang@12.0.5
